name: Mirage (itch) (python-b5, Sam Gorman)
description:
Mirage is a puzzle game where you can't control what you see.

A mirage is something that appears real but is not.

In Mirage, the lights are constantly turning on and off, moving around - and you can't control them. The levels are full of mirages, pink and blue spectral objects that only exist in the dark. There are buttons, blocks, and evil ghosts that try to block your way. 

This unique block-pushing puzzler breaks the conventions of the genre and takes your control of what you see away.

python-b5: programming, level design
Sam Gorman: art, music, level design Make sure to report any bugs in the comments! They will be fixed promptly after the voting period ends. Controls

Move - arrow keys

Interact/enter level - Z

Reset - R
